nio/PhillipsHue.description: This block will control the color of Phillips Hue lights through a hub on the same network, using the Phillips Hue API.

hub_ip.title: Hub IP Address
hub_ip.description: IP Address of the Hub, must be on the same network.

hue.title: Hue (0-65535)
hue.description: The hue value is a wrapping value between 0 and 65535. Both 0 and 65535 are red, 25500 is green and 46920 is blue.

light_number.title: Light Number
light_number.description: Which light connected to the hub to control.

on_state.title: 1 for on 0 for off
on_state.description: Turn the bulb on or off.

sat.title: Saturation (0-254)
sat.description: Saturation of the bulb, with 0 being white and 254 being most color.

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: The user id assigned by the hub.
